user_menu:
MENU
1.Press 1 to view balance.
2.Press 2 to Deposit Money.
3.Press 3 to withdraw Money.
4.Press 4 to trade.
5.To see all Stocks
6.Press q to quit.
admin_menu:
a.To see all Users
b.To remove any User
c.To change role of any User
d.To Block any User.
e.To unblock any user.
f.q to quit.
